Class OI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.utils.CodeThread

    public class OI
extends CodeThread
    A class that handles spawning commands based off of button inputs. TODO(?): Read from NetworkTables for button inputs (Are we still doing that?)

    • Method Detail

      • whenPressed

        public void whenPressed(Button b,
                        Command c)
        Makes a command run when a button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        b - The button to trigger the command.
        c - The command to be run.

      • whenReleased

        public void whenReleased(Button b,
                         Command c)
        Makes a command run when a button is released.
        Parameters:
        b - The button to trigger the command.
        c - The command to be run.

      • whileHeld

        public void whileHeld(Button b,
                      Command c)
        Makes a command run while a button is held. If the command terminates and the button is still held, the command will start again.
        Parameters:
        b - The button to trigger the command.
        c - The command to be run.
